body:
On 2013-06-18 14:10:55 +0000, Germán Molina Larrain said:


> I am thinking on implementing a hybrid methodology between Radiosity 
> method and Ray-tracing, for accelerating some calculations (by giving 
> up accuracy, maybe)


Germán, are you looking for a way to quickly estimate light levels for 
luminaire layout?


Randolph
